title: FUCK YOU RIOT.
body:
I was placed in a lower priority queue for no reason, i stayed in the fountain without alttabbing for 5 minutes when we were losing 20-2 and the enemy team stalled the game, now i have a penalty in which i have to wait 20 minutes before queuing into a game for 5 games cause of this idiotic system, SO DONE.
Fix your fucking game.
